narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 6-year-old male was last seen at Arlington at 2025-09-28T01:06:25.970468+00:00. The child was reported missing by neighbor after failing to meet a friend.
behavioral_patterns: entered vehicle and headed northbound on I-95
left on foot toward nearby woods
merged onto I-64 west toward Richmond
narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 9 hours of disappearance, movement cues merged onto I-64 west toward Richmond suggest travel west toward Blue Ridge along I-81. A silver 2018 Nissan Altima was observed departing near Arlington, Virginia.

witness_accounts.description: Around 9 hours later, a school_staff reported someone matching the description (6-year-old male, wearing white hoodie, khaki shorts, Spider-Man flip-flops) near Suffolk.

provenance._fulltext: A 6-year-old male was last seen at Arlington at 2025-09-28T01:06:25.970468+00:00. The child was reported missing by neighbor after failing to meet a friend. Within 9 hours of disappearance, movement cues merged onto I-64 west toward Richmond suggest travel west toward Blue Ridge along I-81. A silver 2018 Nissan Altima was observed departing near Arlington, Virginia. Around 9 hours later, a school_staff reported someone matching the description (6-year-old male, wearing white hoodie, khaki shorts, Spider-Man flip-flops) near Suffolk.
